Class ArrayStack<E>

java.lang.Object
ArrayStack<E>
Type Parameters:
E - the type of elements held in this stack
All Implemented Interfaces:
Collection<E>, Iterable<E>, Iterable<E>, Stack<E>
class ArrayStack<E> extends Object implements Stack<E>
A simple implementation of a stack using an array-based data structure. The stack allows elements to be pushed onto the top and popped from the top.
